content.prompt: Assume there are 50,000 joules (J) of energy available in trophic level II in the figure. According to the conventional model of energy flow in ecosystems, which of the following statements correctly describes the flow of energy in the system?

choices.label: Trophic level I generates a maximum of 50,000 J of energy.
Trophic level I has approximately 5,000 J of available energy.
Trophic level III has approximately 50 J of available energy.
Trophic level IV has approximately 500 J of available energy.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
